fact: Did you know that there is a story about Napoleon Bonaparte being overwhelmed and forced to retreat from a horde of domestic rabbits during a planned hunt by his Chief of Staff?
didYouKnow: The reliability of this story is up to debate. The earliest known source at this time comes from a text published almost 90 years after the alleged incident. But it still makes for an interesting story nonetheless.

references.title: A Brief Moment of History: When Napoleon Took on Rabbits
Napoleon and the Battle of the Rabbits: Faced with the implacable animal horde, the Emperor beat a hasty retreat
The Time Napoleon Was Attacked by Rabbits
